## common package

This package contains common declarations and definitions for use by both jsPlumb Community and Toolkit editions.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AbstractSegment](./common.abstractsegment.md) | Base class for segments in connectors. |

## Enumerations

|  Enumeration | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AnchorLocations](./common.anchorlocations.md) | Default anchor locations. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [DEFAULT](./common.default.md) | Constant used im various places internally, and in the Toolkit edition used as the key for default node, edge, port and group definitions. |
|  [FALSE](./common.false.md) | Constant for the term "false" |
|  [TRUE](./common.true.md) | Constant for the term "true" |
|  [UNDEFINED](./common.undefined.md) | Constant for matching JS 'undefined'. |
|  [WILDCARD](./common.wildcard.md) | Constant representing the wildcard used in several places in the API. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AnchorId](./common.anchorid.md) | List of entries in the AnchorLocations enum |
|  [AnchorSpec](./common.anchorspec.md) | Models the specification of anchor - which may be a SingleAnchorSpec, or an array of SingleAnchorSpec objects. |
|  [ConnectorId](./common.connectorid.md) | Alias for the use case that a Connector is referenced just by its <code>type</code>. |
|  [ConnectorSpec](./common.connectorspec.md) | Specification of a connector - either the type id of some Connector, a type+options object. |
|  [ConnectorWithOptions](./common.connectorwithoptions.md) | Connector spec in the form <code>{type:.., options:{.. }}</code> |
|  [EndpointId](./common.endpointid.md) |  |
|  [EndpointParams](./common.endpointparams.md) |  |
|  [EndpointSpec](./common.endpointspec.md) |  |
|  [FullAnchorSpec](./common.fullanchorspec.md) | An anchor spec in the form <code>{type:..., options:{ ... }}</code> |
|  [FullEndpointSpec](./common.fullendpointspec.md) |  |
